column4: probably ... its fast, and it "orks" out of the box ... but for people like myself, who likes to make my linux _very_ personal, it was really hard ... IE: Upgrading to CVS on beryl was a chapter itself
Was that a "w" or "b" in front of "orks"?
my point is .. Im glad I got back to ubuntu eventually :)
PCLinuxOS is based on mandriva, and that was fast indeed
